hard_nos.title: You Lie or Play Games
hard_nos.description: Whether it’s cheating, manipulation, or dishonesty, I do not entertain deception. If you say one thing and do another, I am not interested.

hard_nos.title: You Are Emotionally Unavailable
hard_nos.description: If you can’t process your own emotions, struggle with vulnerability, or keep people at a distance, I am not here to force you to open up.

hard_nos.title: You Lack Depth
hard_nos.description: If you live on autopilot, avoid deep thoughts, or fill your life with distractions to avoid real introspection, we are not compatible.

hard_nos.title: You Can’t Communicate Like an Adult
hard_nos.description: If you rely on passive-aggressiveness, silent treatments, or expect people to read your mind, I don’t have time for that.

hard_nos.title: You Are Hot and Cold
hard_nos.description: If you push and pull, love-bomb then withdraw, or are inconsistent with your words and actions, I will remove myself.

hard_nos.title: You Lack Ambition
hard_nos.description: If you drift through life without goals, purpose, or drive, I will find you uninteresting.

hard_nos.title: You Are Controlling
hard_nos.description: If you try to dictate what I do, who I see, or how I live my life, I will leave immediately.

hard_nos.title: You Make Me Feel Like an Option
hard_nos.description: If you don’t prioritize me, treat me like a backup plan, or expect me to chase, I won’t waste my time.

hard_nos.title: You Don’t Take Accountability
hard_nos.description: If you blame others for everything, avoid responsibility, or can’t admit when you’re wrong, I will not respect you.

hard_nos.title: You Are Too Dependent
hard_nos.description: If you can’t function independently, need constant reassurance, or expect me to be your emotional babysitter, I am not the one.

hard_nos.title: You Are Cheap with Effort
hard_nos.description: If you put in the bare minimum, expect me to carry the connection, or don’t show up fully, I will not engage.

hard_nos.title: You Need Constant Validation
hard_nos.description: If your self-worth is tied to attention and you need external validation at all times, I am not your emotional crutch.

hard_nos.title: You Make Everything About Yourself
hard_nos.description: If you dominate conversations, never ask about me, and see relationships as one-sided, I have no interest in that dynamic.

hard_nos.title: You Lack Self-Awareness
hard_nos.description: If you don’t reflect on your actions, can’t recognize your flaws, and refuse to grow, I will lose respect for you quickly.

hard_nos.title: You’re a Walking Red Flag
hard_nos.description: If you describe yourself as toxic, emotionally detached, or a heartbreaker, that is not a flex—I avoid people like you.

hard_nos.title: You Can’t Handle Constructive Criticism
hard_nos.description: If every critique feels like an attack and you get defensive instead of self-reflecting, I won’t waste my breath.

hard_nos.title: You Have No Sense of Accountability
hard_nos.description: If you gaslight, shift blame, or make excuses instead of owning up to mistakes, I will never trust you.

hard_nos.title: You Expect Me to Mother You
hard_nos.description: If you lack independence, need constant caretaking, or want a relationship that mimics parenting, I am not the one.

hard_nos.title: You’re Indecisive & Wishy-Washy
hard_nos.description: If you can’t make up your mind, constantly flip-flop, or string people along, I am not here for that uncertainty.

hard_nos.title: You Are a Jealous or Possessive Person
hard_nos.description: If you need to control who I talk to, get insecure over nothing, or try to restrict my independence, I will leave.

hard_nos.title: You’re Always in Some Kind of Drama
hard_nos.description: If you have constant issues with exes, friendships, work, or life in general, I am not signing up for that mess.

hard_nos.title: You Think Vulnerability is Weakness
hard_nos.description: If you mock emotions, avoid real connection, or see deep conversations as unnecessary, I will not find you interesting.

hard_nos.title: You Are a Chronic Over-Promiser
hard_nos.description: If you say things you don’t mean, make commitments you don’t follow through on, or overpromise and underdeliver, I will not tolerate it.

hard_nos.title: You Lack Basic Manners & Social Awareness
hard_nos.description: If you’re rude to waiters, inconsiderate in public, or don’t respect personal space, you are not someone I want around.

hard_nos.title: You Take More Than You Give
hard_nos.description: If you drain people, take advantage of kindness, or always expect others to do things for you, I will not entertain that imbalance.

hard_nos.title: You Don’t Respect My Boundaries
hard_nos.description: If you push my limits, ignore my needs, or try to test how much I will tolerate, I will immediately cut you off.

hard_nos.title: You Have a Victim Mindset
hard_nos.description: If you believe the world is always against you, never take charge of your own life, and blame everyone else, we are not a match.

hard_nos.title: You Lack Emotional Control
hard_nos.description: If you lash out, explode over small things, or let your emotions dictate your actions, I will not engage in the chaos.

hard_nos.title: You Play the Field
hard_nos.description: If you’re still figuring out what you want and casually collecting options, I will not be one of them.
